clues.text: His "Elegy on the Year 1788" begins, "For lords or kings I dinna mourn, e'en let them die--for that they're born"

Steven Zaillian said hello to both Oscar & Oskar in penning this 1993 film set in WWII Poland
In the King James Bible, Yahweh, the personal name of God, is rendered as this

clues.text: U.S. 66 runs from Chicago to L.A.; this devilishly numbered route runs from Monticello, Utah to Douglas, Arizona
2,400-mile U.S. Highway 1 runs from Fort Kent in this state all the way down to Florida

rounds.text: This man was killed in a duel in Weehawken, New Jersey 2 1/2 years after his son died in a duel there
